title: Card: grey
code:
<gds-card padding="l" variant="primary">
  <gds-text tag="h1" font-size="heading-xl">Hello World</gds-text>
  <gds-text color="secondary">Start editing to see live preview</gds-text>
  <gds-flex gap="s">
    <gds-button>
      Primary
    </gds-button>
    <gds-button rank="secondary">
      secondary
    </gds-button>
</gds-card>
